thread.title: Jeremy Kyle’s “hot” new Welsh security guard sends fans into meltdown
thread.title_full: Jeremy Kyle’s “hot” new Welsh security guard sends fans into meltdown

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Jeremy Kyle’s “hot” new Welsh security guard sends fans into meltdown
text:
Jeremy Kyle’s “hot” new Welsh security guard sends fans into meltdown Fans beg ITV to show more of the "gorgeous" new security guy Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Twitter goes wild as hunky new security guard is revealed Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jeremy Kyle had fans all of a flutter today – thanks to a “hot” new security guard. 
The new tall, dark and handsome member of security staff was introduced by Jeremy who couldn’t resist poking fun at the new guy. 
“Have you seen the new security guard?” Jeremy asked old security hand Steve. 
“He’s still looking a bit lost, he might be very good but he looks a bit awkward to me. Are you Welsh? Ooh lovely.” Jeremy Kyle made fun of the new security guard (Photo: ITV) Fans were quick to comment on the new guy's appearance (Photo: ITV) Jeremy tried to get Steve to do a Welsh accent (Photo: ITV) 
Jeremy then goaded security guy Steve into doing a Welsh accent – but to no avail. 
Despite the new guy’s shyness, fans took to Twitter in their droves to comment on the hunky new addition to the show. 
Last week, Jeremy Kyle viewers were forced to turn the subtitles on during the show. 
Trevor appeared on the show to accuse his girlfriend of snogging two different women. 
While Jeremy appeared to feel for the man at first after he admitted he was "really nervous," the host's sympathy quickly came to an end when the bloke admitted to also kissing two other people. 
That was all well and good, but many ITV viewers rushed to Twitter to reveal that they had no idea what was going on - because they couldn't understand a word! Viewers couldn't understand Trevor (Photo: ITV) Fans rushed to Twitter to share their confusion (Photo: ITV) 
Trevor's accent was so strong, and he was speaking so quietly, that without subtitles he was barely audible. Read More 
One completely lost viewer tweeted: "The subtitle writers deserve a bonus for translating this fella #jeremykyle" 
What is he saying? I refuse to turn the TV up #jeremykyle," ranted a second. Thank god for subtitles (Photo: ITV) 
Think we need a translator for this one #JeremyKyle," added a third confused viewer. 
A fourth said: "Is that guy even speaking words? How can anyone actually understand him? #jeremykyle" 
It was all happy news in the end for the couple though, after Trevor's girlfriend passed the lie detector with flying colours. Like us on Facebook
